Hugo Deep Red Eau de Parfum - 90 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2760

Key Features

  • Fruity-floral Aroma
  • Audacious and Razor-sharp
  • Fantastic Blend of Sweet Citrus and Woodsy Tones

Designed for the contemporary woman who is ambitious yet elegant the Hugo Deep Red Eau de Parfum brings out your sensual side.

Fruity-floral Aroma

The fruity floral aroma is infused with top notes of crisp Pear Mandarin Orange Blood Orange Clementine and Blackcurrant. Spicy heart notes of Ginger Freesia Tuberose and Hibiscus Seed fade off into base notes of Vanilla Musk California Cedar and Sandalwood.

Audacious and Razor-sharp

This Deep Red is an epitome of the audacious and razor sharp personality of the contemporary woman. Confident and daring she takes the lead to mesmerize the world.

Fantastic Blend of Sweet Citrus and Woodsy Tones

Perfect for an evening the Hugo Deep Red Eau de Parfum comes with a fantastic blend of citrusy sweet and woody tones.

column17:
Hugo XX Eau de Toilette - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2622

Key Features

  • A Subtly Feminine Fragrance Featuring Basmati Rice Accord
  • Creamy and Sensual Feel
  • Fresh and Youthful Fragrance
  • Jasmine and Chlorise Rose Accord
  • Woody Floral Fragrance with Musky Notes
Fruity and floral XX from the house of Hugo Boss embodies the essence of the modern woman and her spirit of confluence through divergence. Total harmony between the masculine and the feminine is over-rated and outmoded; XX is emblematic of a new generation with a unique take on relationships.

With its underlying tones of sensuality and sophistication Hugo XX defines the aura of a mature woman - audacious yet alluring. The gourmand and fruity notes of this Eau de Toilette open with a delightful top note of lychee blackcurrant and mandarin only to unite with a soothing heart note of basmati rice and jasmine sambac to create a contemporary and intriguing aroma. The musky scent of sandalwood in the base note leaves behind a trail of luxuriously earthy essence which provides a beguiling contrast to the top and heart notes - just like the inherent contradiction between sexes between the yin and the yang. Yet the accords unite and synchronize in a manner that is reminiscent of the essential attraction and aggression between each of these incongruent denominations.

The seductively intense Hugo XX is encased in cylindrical vials with shiny golden tones inspired by bottles of colourful spray-paint. Unpretentious and vibrant XX defines the spirit of modern femininity.
